argument.name: tablename
argument.description: Optional. Default = Primary table. The name of the Alpha table.

page.description: Returns TRUE if the current record has been marked for deletion.
page.discussion: DELETED() returns .T. (TRUE) if the current record in Table_Name is deleted; otherwise it returns .F. (FALSE). If no table is specified, this function applies to the primary table. Note : The DELETED() function cannot be used in filter expressions.

section.title: Example
section.description: This example assumes that record 1 has not been deleted but record 8 has been deleted.
section.example: dim tbl as P tbl = table.open("customer") tbl.fetch_first() ? deleted() = .F. tbl.fetch_goto(8) ? deleted() = .T.
